snippet: Detroit's Jimmy Devellano and Toronto's Brian Burke each spoke out about fighting last week, representing diametrically different points of view.
abstract: Detroit's Jimmy Devellano and Toronto's Brian Burke each spoke out about fighting last week, representing diametrically different points of view.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

lead_paragraph: It was coincidental, but two successful N.H.L. team executives, Detroit's Jimmy Devellano and Toronto's Brian Burke, spoke out about fighting in the game last Thursday. They represent diametrically different points of view on the subject, and they were not speaking in response to each other, but it was as good as a point/counterpoint presentation of dueling editorials.

headline.main: A Call to End Fighting; a Defense of Retribution
